## Here is the setup code!
```{r setup}
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = ":memory:")
dbWriteTable(con, "acs_p", read.csv("C:/Users/ozd504/Github/r_courses/data/pums_tx_ca_2019.csv"), overwrite=T)
dbWriteTable(con, "acs_h", read.csv("C:/Users/ozd504/Github/r_courses/data/pums_tx_ca_hh_2019.csv"), overwrite=T)
```

## Here is the sql code!
```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT * FROM acs_p LIMIT 10 WHERE AGEP <18;
```
## And here is different sql code!
```{sql, connection=con}

```
